Mostly play this on console so hours are inaccurate but even playing with mouse and keyboard is amazing. Highly recommend this game. Mild horror, strategy and great to play with friends.
Amazing game to play alone and with friends

life is a burden and i only play this game because i hate myself. i genuinely believe that i have been graced with god's toughest battles and that is why i embrace this game as a lifestyle. 

8.7/10 kinda unbalanced
I've been a console player since the Silent Hill release, just got a PC after the holidays and absolutely love it on PC. 1000% would buy it on every system though

здравовзствайте сегодня я хачу вам раскозать пра эту класную игральку.
начём я зашол в неё была 3 ночи утро, пришла мама и дала мне пизды за та что я сильна заарал кагда вышил маекаел маиюрс он бил на 1 стадие и я ни слышол терор. Как итог игру мне мама удалила и сказала идти учить ураки.

Muy buen juego tiene sus bugeos y  tiene mucho tiempo de espera en los servidores de pc max 25mins pero es un juego con graficos muy buenos y una tematica con killers  y sobrevivientes chidos recomendado

szczerze gra jest nawet spoko  czemu to tak jest ale to proste zniechęcacie duzo gracz nerfiąc fajnych killerów którzy trzymają przy sobie killermainów lecz to nie jest jedyny problem tej gry a problemami są rzeczy takie jak bugi wyzwan bugi z bloodpointsami , texturami... To bardzo męczy wszyskich może czasem rozśmieszyć lub tylko zniechęcic gracza.
Lecz tak naprawde istotną rzeczą są killerzy, jakie oni mają skille i problem jest w tym że najlepszy skillowo killer jest zbugowany moza by to określić ze nie dopracowany (nurs). Części killerów jest porostu słabe i ludzie grając nimi tylko się męczą. Pamiętajmy ze ta gra składa się z survów i ich problemem jest to ze killer campi tuneluje face-campił i duzo innych rzeczy, i naprawdę to męczy ze buba (letherface) nic nie traci bo dla niego ranga to jest najmniej wazna rzecz. Moim zdaniem aby gra była fajniejsza aby dac buffa większości killerom aby dac ankiete czy ludzie chcą starego czy terazniejszego billego, czy dany killer, perk, addon powinienen byc zbuffowany czy znerfiony i dlaczego tak, czy jakaś dana rzecz potrzebuje reworka. Mozna znaleści pozytywy tez w tej grze np ze robicie reworki map są tekstury lepszej jakości ,ze mozna pograc z kolegami, ze jakims killerem fajniej ci się gra ,widzisz bug i mozesz się posmiac, można zobaczyc jak rozwijacie tą gre ale bez poprawek i zdania społeczności to coś tracicie.

OMG I CAN BELIEVE IT 1000hrs in this game holy crap omg where can i even start with this,dbd is the most love and hate relationship ive everhad like on god bro this game wants me to love ittt sooooo much sometimes and other times i wanna kill it but danggg this is the most entertaining game ive ever played. for u new players coming in this summer or whenever this game iss amazing but toxic sometimes, i do beleive the community here sometimes is good and sometimes is bad i recommend for all u new gamers to take this game as a joke ITS JUST A GAME ive learned that rank dosent matter thats how u get to high ranks an watching tutorials and gameplay reviews its ok to seek help theres nothing to be ashamed about i really reccomend getting better if u want to i just think being better gives wayyyy more opportunitys just have fun im pretty sure no one is going to read this review but if so i hope you guys enjoy this gameee love u all<3 thanks dead by daylight for everything bottom of my heart
I've played this game for many years on PS4 and recently got it for PC and still love playing this game everyday.
alot of kids play this game so ?

Изначально я скачивал только по одной причине - у меня был жуткий зуд в попе, поэтому я и решил поиграть, дабы снять напряжение, пока я был на 20-х рангах - очень даже помогало, но затем спустя 742 часа, почему то, попа то и дело стала  очень сильно болеть...

Their support team is braindead. Devs have included a feature in a game where you cant see players' steam profiles. Thus, the only information you have is their name, thats it. Also you cant spot them in previously played with, because apparently steam does not keep track of dbd players (Obviously the devs have messed with it). Having that in mind, I encountered a group of survivors whom steam profiles I could not access to. They were cheaters, like speedhack, they have disabled my killer's ability and also I could not pick them up when they went down. The moment I saw suspicious gameplay I turned on NVIDIA's recording. Btw almost for 10 mins I was getting infinite loop by survivors on the killer shack. They had also disabled bloodlust, so I could never catch them. Anyway, having the video and also reporting them using the in-game chat, it was time to find where to send the video. After 1 hour of looking where to send the additional information and fill the form, I get a message from a guy in support saying: "we need the steam id to link to the player". I asked him very kindly, how is that possible when you yourselves have included this feature that hides steam profile. I even asked him, cant you just link my report in-game with their id, because I also showed in the video I reported them and they could see their names and they had my own steam ID. I mean that f* report must send some info, right? Apparently, they need ME to send their steam id of players whom I met in a game which HAS THE FEATURE TO HIDE THE STEAM PROFILE. At this point I am wondering, how is this game is not filled with cheaters.

Considering that I wasted 1 hour of my life (not including the game with the cheaters, who dragged the game as long as possible), I provided any information I could and the support guy responded to me like this, I am saying f@ck you to this game. I mean that answer is equal to trolling, I cant describe it as something else. Apparently the in-game report system is total garbage and having not a proper report system and being themselves so morons (excuse me) and incompetent I cant recommend this game.

I did not even mention the other issues that it has in terms of game design, but this is not the point. It was not a perfect game but still was a game you could enjoy. But not after this, when devs clearly dont give a damn, I wont be a fool playing a game where they have a report system doing shit and support team that answers to me worse than a troll. Ez uninstall as toxic survivors would say
The game is very fun, nice thrills, scary in a good way, also fun to hunt survivors as a killer

Начнем с того, что мне про эту игру говорили в других онлайн играх в таких, как кс го, дота.
И все что я слышал, это мол онлайна нет, разработчики не работают над игрой, и тому подобное.
Но вот что вам скажу я:
Я играл в нее еще в 2018 году на другом аккаунте,  и по сравнению с тем годом сейчас онлайн намного больше.
-Быстрее находится игра, раньше играя за убийцу, пока искалась игра я успевал сварить себе пельменей и поесть. Сейчас же и за ту и за другую сторону находится игра за минуту две, кроме вечера, вечером онлайн падает и игра ищется долговато. 
-Убийцы стали играть намного лучше, чем раньше, играть стало намного интереснее.
-Выжившие так же не теряют хватки, бывают конечно козлы, которые дисконектятся с самого начала игры, но и в троем бывало мы могли затащить и свалить.
-Коллекция убийц и выживших пополнилась, и это радует, больше выбора, дает больше вариотивности. 
-Баги есть,но они бывают лишь от проблемы движка, а те которые могли бы произойти из криворукости разрабов не видел не разу. Большинство тех кто говорит, что разрабы не следят за игрой, просто не знают разницы между проблем кода, слияния текстур, и работы движка.
В эту игру можно не донатить, всех персонажей можно купить за валюту которую дают за уровни, да и стоят они не дорого 133 рубля за персонажа, пф проживу без одной пачки сигарет.
Я редко играю в одного, и за убийцу так же редко.
Играть в нее намного интереснее с такими же комрадами как и вы. Так что если решите ее взять, подарите и друганам, будет намного веселее.
Оценка от меня для этой игры: 9 из 10.
Не добавил лишь балл из-за того, что врядли я буду в нее играть вечно. Карты приедятся, персонажи так же.
Но думаю, скоро я изменю свое решение, после 2к часов наверное))
Me lo compré para poder jugar como Ash Williams y al final el juego ha acabado gustándome.
Bon jeux si on y joue à plusieurs

Dead by daylight is quite fun whether you are playing solo or with friends as you are able to play as the killer or survivor. Each match is never the same with tonnes of maps, perks and items. While there are a few bugs in my 455 hours none of the ones ive encountered are game breaking.
Friday 14 the dame wothout voice chat , totally good game
Love it! (even tho people arent that afraid of the killers cause the game is a bit biased ;P) its fun and toxic at times but i do recomend it and it gets better each update so ya 9/10 :3

I kind of hate this game and barely play it anymore, but can't not recommend it after playing it for 1000+ hours, right?

Whether you're a casual, a psycho, a toxic piece of shit, or simply a pageant console player, you will find what you're looking for.

O jogo é bom, porem a comunidade é mais tóxica que chernobyl no dia da explosão

Really fun game.
Unlike alot of other games, the survivor role isn't less intersting than the killer role. There is alot of variety and
you have to learn how to play. This can be confusing for beginners.
But alot of mechanics don't have a skill cap, so you can always get better.

I've playing dead by daylight for a while and I love it it's fun I like the new killers in it I can't wait for the other Killers to happen but it's overall it's really fun and I like to play with my friends and everything like the level of my characters grind for a blood points and I'm out stunned with this game leaving me speechless for the new chapters they get out I like stranger things and binding of kin it's my favorite one now I have ghostface and more but overall it's fun game and you should try it out too

This game is more and more survivor sided.
They're  thousands of bugs and the devs do nothing against it. The  only important thing for the devs is money. (Sad because this game has a lot of potential.
This is definetly the wrong way my lovely developer team.
(I has a great time with this game).

The more you play and rank up as killer, the more tryhard and toxic survivors get, basically laughing in your face while you can't do anything. The devs are pieces of shit as well, not even bothering to balance their game, nerfing the killer side to the ground and buffing the survivors. You have to play dirty on the killer side to win, and I'm not human trash like some people I've seen.

I may not have thousands of hours like many do, and using that as an argument to ''bully'' me makes you a no-lifer and a piece of shit, so keep that away, thank you.

Muy divertido, entretenido, y podes matar toxicos que hacen TyBack o te clickean la linterna xD
This is a very good coop / horror game, with a smart assymetric mechanic into it!
Игра в целом ничего, только есть игроки токсики руинеры, а так нормально)
Extremamente divertido para jogar com os amigos, com uma jogabilidade inovadora!

運営がクソなため、まともなゲームになっていない。
マッチングとかは特にひどく、LV15,6のキラーに対し、全員LV3,4のサバイバーがマッチングし、一方的にゲームを進められたりということばかり。
アイテムの効果も不明で、罠の解除確率が低くなるてきなものをつけてもバンバン解除されたりする。
キャラクターのバランスも悪く、一部のキラーは非常に優遇、一部のキラー非常に不遇。
またプレイヤーの民度が低く、相手をあおりまくり。
プレイするとストレスが非常にたまるゲームです。
It's a TIMELESS CLASSIC Duh. The feeling of chasing someone around as a deranged killer, or being the lonely survivor just trying to live another die is quite fun- Ethan Karman.

Man oh man do they constantly update this game with new enemies and survivors! I've never seen a team so engaged with a game than the ones that made Dead by Daylight. 
I've been playing this game since it's early days on PC and have watched it grow to be this beast of a cult classic.
Play as a killer and hunt down 4 other survivors trying to escape, or play as a survivor, trying to work together as a killer player tries to outwit you.
Basically a really really fun game of cat and mouse with a ass load of perks and items to customize.
Love it.

I've played dbd for over 1,000 hours now (360 hours on console) and it still has the exact same flaws and toxicity it has always had. BHVR (the developers) prioritise making money over making the game playable, forcing out chapter after chapter with very little but expensive content that comes with a massive amount of bugs that they leave months to fix. It genuinely takes them almost half a year each time to produce actual meaningful balance changes and even then they either don't really work or it's only for a handful of things in the game. 

Even more so, the way they balance this game is by having things that are extremely powerful in one situation but useless in the next, which just ends up in having unfair match ups where you can't do anything at all and then your opponent can't do anything at all against you. It leaves winning feeling incredibly unsatisfying, as half the time you only win because the game is poorly designed. And when you lose, it feels worse than normal, as most of the time you only lose because the game is poorly designed (again). This kind of thing is told incredibly frequently to BHVR through their twitter posts and through instagram and countless other communities, but they ignore it and push it back so they can milk more money from their playerbase and continue to produce flawed and buggy content. 

Even if the gameplay itself wasn't very inconsistent and unfun, the coding team at BHVR seems to have no idea what they're doing. Each chapter releases with hundreds of gamebreaking issues that take ages to be resolved, each update takes several hours because the spaghetti code has to be patched in it's entirety for even the smallest updates, and the hackers and just general server issues make trying to play the game (in its already flawed and inconsistent state) impossible at times. 

In essence this game is incredibly mistreated by a terrible development team that only wants to make money from the game and doesn't really care about its success. I still play this game because I hope, dearly, that one day it will improve, and that one day it will finally live up to the potential it actually has. The gameplay elements are interesting and the characters are much more so, but the game never lives up to the idea it presents itself as. 

I hope one day that Dead by Daylight will finally be treated right, but I know deep down that it never will.

Dead by Daylight is a exciting, innovative game. However, the developers rest on their knowledge that this game has no comarable games around it, so the costumers have no alternative to playing this game. Therefore, they are very lazy, don't bring a lot of content and a ton of ridiculous bugs at every update. They destroy their game, which is btw their only success. The game is fun for beginners and it keeps fun a long time, but as you get involved into the game there is more and more a love-hate-relashionship.  
Some videos that explain this topic further:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OhjNIKpZZy0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BHJ84LN4vz4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7QW6_qIooyU
